item.title: Chalcot Square Gardens, 10th November
item.description:
The benches in the middle of the square require attention. Several of the wooden slats are completely broken, creating a potential safety hazard. About a month ago, tape was placed around some of the benches, though it’s unclear whether this was done by the council and it was quickly removed by children playing in the area. The broken slats need to be removed, the benches inspected to ensure they are safe to use, and the damage repaired ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chalcot Square, Chalk Farm, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No lights - Dover Patrol bus stop, 10th November
item.description:

item.title: The whole road needs leaf cleaning especially outside nos 56-58 lyndhurst road, 10th November
item.description:
The pavement and the grass verges needs to cleaned of leaves that a problem large tree and crab apple tree making mess on the pavement and my driveway. Can be dangerous to elderly walking on the pavement when it rains/slippery. Please come and clean it up. We have swept the best we can. many times. Been messy for many weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lyndhurst Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Near no.1 Chalcot Sq, 10th November
item.description:
